name: Triple M
goal: Professional consultancy for businesses, focused on agriculture, foodstuffs and related fields. Lobbying and interaction with relevant policy-makers in the EU institutions. Defending interests of the founding members towards the institutions.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Primary and secondary legislation on foodstuffs and environment.
General business environment. Reform of the common agricultural policy and relevant topics (reform of the EU budget, cohesion policy etc.)
